member.name: T:ZipHelperLib.ZipHelper
member.summary: This is a C# .Net Standard library which enables zipping and unzipping strings in memory. Zip and Unzip in memory using System.IO.Compression.
member.remarks: Please check if System.IO.Compression and Linq are included.

member.name: M:ZipHelperLib.ZipHelper.Zip(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Zips a string into a zipped byte array.

member.name: M:ZipHelperLib.ZipHelper.Zip(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Zips a byte array into a zipped byte array.
member.param: The byte array to be zipped.

member.name: M:ZipHelperLib.ZipHelper.Unzip(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Unzip a zipped byte array into a string.
member.param: The byte array to be unzipped
member.returns: string representing the original stream (Default Encoding)

member.name: M:ZipHelperLib.ZipHelper.UnzipByteArray(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Unzip a zipped byte array into a string.
member.param: The byte array to be unzipped
member.returns: string representing the original byte array stream
